      • getVisibilityMask

        public final Long getVisibilityMask()
        Visibility mask of a camera. When (camera's visibility_mask & visual's visibility_flags) evaluates to non-zero, the visual will be visible to the camera.

      • getPose

        public final Pose getPose()
        A position(x,y,z) and orientation(roll, pitch yaw) with respect to the frame named in the relative_to attribute.
